headline: What Williams-Sonoma (WSM)'s Early ChatGPT Ad Pilot Move Means For Shareholders
summary: On 11 February 2026, Williams-Sonoma, Inc. announced it had joined OpenAI’s Ad Pilot Program, becoming one of the first retailers to test clearly labeled, privacy-conscious ads within ChatGPT to surface relevant products at key decision-making moments. This early move into AI-driven, high-intent advertising channels stands out against the company’s recent flat same-store sales and ongoing store footprint reductions. We’ll now examine how Williams-Sonoma’s early use of ChatGPT-native...
